Spa<\/strong>&nbsp;to\u0323a la\u0323c tr&ecirc;n hai ho\u0300n \u0111a\u0309o ngay c\u01b0\u0309a s&ocirc;ng Ca\u0301i va\u0300 khu di ti\u0301ch Tha\u0301p Ba\u0300 Ponagar. Resort c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay Cam Ranh kho\u1ea3ng 39,2km, c&aacute;ch ga Nha Trang 2,4km v&agrave; c&aacute;ch trung t&acirc;m th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Nha Trang kho\u1ea3ng 3,6km.<br \/>\r\nKhu ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chia th&agrave;nh 02 khu: Khu kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Cham Island (cao 4 t\u1ea7ng) v&agrave; Khu c\u0103n h\u1ed9 du l\u1ecbch (cao 6 t\u1ea7ng) &amp; Bi\u1ec7t th\u1ef1 Cham Oasis. Khu ngh\u1ec9 c&oacute; 168 ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed1 tr&iacute; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Resort do C&ocirc;ng Ty B&Igrave;NH<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Gi\u1eefa m&agrave;u xanh b\u1ea1t ng&agrave;n c\u1ee7a n&uacute;i r\u1eebng trung du H&ograve;a B&igrave;nh \u0111ang h&igrave;nh th&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u01b0u mang t&ecirc;n Ivory Villas &amp; Resort. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch tr&ecirc;n di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch 66ha, Ivory Villas &amp; Resort g\u1ed3m 4 ph&acirc;n khu ch&iacute;nh, m\u1ed7i ph&acirc;n khu l&agrave; 1 resort ho&agrave;n ch\u1ec9nh v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng n&eacute;t ri&ecirc;ng v&agrave; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li&ecirc;n k\u1ebft trong m\u1ed9t t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o n&ecirc;n m\u1ed9t chu\u1ed7i nh\u1eefng ti\u1ec7n nghi \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p.<\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\" style=\"text-align: center;\"><iframe align=\"middle\" allowfullscreen=\"0\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"350\" scrolling=\"no\" src=\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/XTBQ6IC-CGQ\" width=\"500\"><\/iframe><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div B&Igrave;NH<\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/div>\r\n\r\n<p data-css=\"tve-u-17228f059ed\"><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Gi\u1eefa m&agrave;u xanh l\u01b0u mang t&ecirc;n Ivory Villas &amp; Resort. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch tr&ecirc;n di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch 66ha, Ivory Villas &amp; Resort g\u1ed3m 4 ph&acirc;n khu ch&iacute;nh, m\u1ed7i Trang<\/strong>&nbsp;t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c \u1edf ngay trung t&acirc;m th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1,&nbsp;<strong>kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Virgo&nbsp;<\/strong>h\u1ee9a h\u1eb9n \u0111em l\u1ea1i cho du kh&aacute;ch nh\u1eefng ph&uacute;t gi&acirc;y th\u01b0 th&aacute;i c&ugrave;ng khung c\u1ea3nh thi&ecirc;n nhi&ecirc;n bi\u1ec3n tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi trong h&agrave;nh tr&igrave;nh kh&aacute;m ph&aacute; th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 bi\u1ec3n Nha Trang.&nbsp; Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Virgo c&oacute; 40 t\u1ea7ng v&agrave; 2 t\u1ea7ng h\u1ea7m, trong \u0111&oacute; bao g\u1ed3m 453 ph&ograve;ng c&ugrave;ng 143 c\u0103n h\u1ed9 theo \u0111u\u1ed5i phong c&aacute;ch thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf tr\u1ebb trung, hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i v&agrave; \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; t\u1ea7m nh&igrave;n h\u01b0\u1edbng bi\u1ec3n v&agrave; th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1. V\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch nh\u01b0 ph&ograve;ng h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb, nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng v&agrave; bar c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 v\u1ecb tr&iacute; thu\u1eadn RISEMOUNT","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>RESSORT RISEMOUNT \u0110&Agrave; N\u1eb4NG<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong>Risemount Resort \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng<\/strong>&nbsp;t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n Tho\u1ea1i thu\u1ed9c ph\u01b0\u1eddng M\u1ef9 An, qu\u1eadn Ng\u0169 H&agrave;nh S\u01a1n. Khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng kho\u1ea3ng 3 km, c&aacute;ch ga \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng kho\u1ea3ng 3,4 km v&agrave; t\u1ea7m 25 km \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn Ph\u1ed1 c\u1ed5 H\u1ed9i An.<br \/>\r\n<br \/>\r\nResort \u0111i v&agrave;o ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng n\u0103m 2016. \u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng t\u1eeb n&eacute;t \u0111\u1eb9p quy\u1ebfn r\u0169 c\u1ee7a h&ograve;n \u0111\u1ea3o Santorini thu\u1ed9c Hy L\u1ea1p, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng gam m&agrave;u t\u01b0\u01a1i s&aacute;ng trong kh&ocirc;ng gian tho&aacute;ng \u0111&atilde;ng c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng v&ograve;m m&aacute;i xanh da tr\u1eddi k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi khu&ocirc;n vi&ecirc;n r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i, h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i t\u1ea7ng th\u01b0\u1ee3ng v&agrave; v\u1ecb tr&iacute; thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch bi\u1ec3n v&agrave;i ph&uacute;t..<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"500\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/0.jpg\" width=\"800\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"ressort-risemount","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"0","icon":"1691631153_9.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691631153","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"8","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"RESSORT RISEMOUNT","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"RESSORT RISEMOUNT","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"RESSORT RISEMOUNT","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"},"136":{"id":"136","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<h3>Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n<\/h3>\r\n\r\n<p>KH&Aacute;CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH&Ecirc; \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110&Agrave; N\u1eb4NG khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m 2018.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c 258 V&otilde; Nguy&ecirc;n Gi&aacute;p, \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng. V\u1ecb tr&iacute; tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng t\u1ea1i \u0110&agrave; N\u1eb5ng. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&aacute;ch s&acirc;n bay t\u1ea7m 12 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe. C&aacute;ch H\u1ed9i An 30 ph&uacute;t l&aacute;i xe.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n 5 sao g\u1ed3m 12 t\u1ea7ng. V\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u h\u1ea1ng ph&ograve;ng cho du kh&aacute;ch l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn. \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf theo m&ocirc; h&igrave;nh ch\u1eef T n&ecirc;n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u1ec1u nh&igrave;n th\u1ea5y bi\u1ec3n. C&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v&agrave; trang tr&iacute; b\u1edfi n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t cao c\u1ea5p.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n 5 sao c&oacute; \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 v&agrave; d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ho&agrave;n h\u1ea3o nh\u01b0 nh&agrave; h&agrave;ng, ph&ograve;ng gym, bar, h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i tr\u01b0\u1edbc bi\u1ec3n,..<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"600\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/2(12).jpg\" width=\"800\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"khach-san-my-khe-duc-long-da-nang","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"0","icon":"1691630505_3.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691630505","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"21","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N M\u1ef8 KH\u00ca \u0110\u1ee8C LONG \u0110\u00c0 N\u1eb4NG","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"}}
